post.text: "The fear of nuclear war that we had as children, I never thought our children would ever have to deal with that again."

comment.author: Marissa
comment.text: Are y'all serious? This is why this election is so important. A bully with the nuclear codes, it's probably the only reason Drumf is running.

replies.author: Marissa
replies.text: Classy, just like a Drumpf supporter.

replies.author: Stevie Lynn
replies.text: Search out the "daisy ad" who it was made for and why. Smh, she depends on you all not being old enough or to not do your research. Here's a hint, LBJ wasn't liked either so this was a last ditch "effort" to get him elected. He drug Vietnam on and was a scum sucking racist, but yay he was for socialism for "votes", so that makes it alright. Smh...

replies.author: Marissa
replies.text: The funny thing is, it's not Hillary it's Trump people actually fear. He is a capricious petulant man-child who has no ability to be given authority over our country. I don't care when, where, or why the ad was made, the issue is what Trump has said in regards to nukes. He is completely ignorant of the ramifications of actions that would alter the world. No thanks.

replies.author: Stevie Lynn
replies.text: Do you know what's going on in the world right now, do you know how precariously close we are to WWIII due to our "foreign policy" under Obama and Hillary and you're worried about Trump. World leaders do not look up to her, there's no way they can, not anymore and they are tired of the "games" that have been played and the carnage they have caused. The Chinese didn't leave Obama on the tarmac by accident at the G20. Trump can draw intelligence and wisdom from others in our government and will "listen" to what is best for us, not what is best for western global banks and their and her own pocket like Hillary does. Wow, Stalin and Lenin would be so proud of you.
